son32java.son32reader

Class Son32Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • son32java.son32reader.Son32Channel

  • public class Son32Channel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a model for a single Son32 channel. The Son32Reader will contian a reference to all channels.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Son32Channel.ChannelKind
      This enum represents the relation between the channel type and the short value it is represented by.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateArraySizeByTime

        public int calculateArraySizeByTime(double intervall)
        This methode will calculate the size of an array that can be filled with all data point from the given intervall. The intervall is given in sconds
        Parameters:
        intervall - The duration of the time intervall
        Returns:
        The optimal array size.

      • getRealDataByDP

        public void getRealDataByDP(double sTime,
                            double[] target)
        Get data for this channel form the .smr file. No data after sTime in seconds will be returned. The number of data points returned is equal to the length of the target array, which will be compltly filled.
        Parameters:
        sTime - No data before this starting time in second will be returned.
        target - The target array for the data.

      • getRealDataByTime

        public void getRealDataByTime(double sTime,
                              double eTime,
                              double[] target)
        Get data for this channel from the .smr file. All data from the given time intervall will be returned. Make sure the traget array can store all data points. The methode will fetch as much data point, as the array can store.
        Parameters:
        sTime - The start time of the intervall in sec.
        eTime - The end time of the intervall in sec.
        target - The target array for the data.
